Title: Journey to the Timeless Isle
Description:
The bronze dragonflight has discovered a most unusual pandaren phenomenon, $c. Emerging from the mists, far off the coast of the Jade Forest - an island that was lost in time!

It is a dangerous place, perhaps the most perilous in all of Pandaria. But we are determined to unravel its mysteries.

Here, take this timepiece. A single click will whisk you to the island. Get yourself established, and speak with Watcher Lara. She will guide you to our chief investigator.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Watcher Lara on the Timeless Isle, off the coast of the Jade Forest.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Watcher Lara on the Timeless Isle, off the coast of the Jade Forest.
RewardText: I see Chronormu has made good on her promise! You are right on time.
